message: Let's start fair, Bob. We each get half.
I'll take the lead, you can't refuse!
I'll take 55 this time, Bob. Let's be reasonable.
You're getting desperate, I'm getting bold!
I'm willing to give you a little more this time, Bob. Let's end this before we lose too much.
You're getting soft, I'm getting strong!
Bob, we're getting close to the end. Let's be realistic and split it 65/35. It's better than nothing!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
Bob, I'm willing to give you a little more this time.  Let's settle this before we both lose everything!
You're getting closer, but I'm not done yet!
Bob, this is my final offer.  It's better for both of us than ending up with nothing. Let's end this now.
You've pushed me too far, Alice. I'm taking it all!
